title: Reddit
cleaned_text: an Asian American and Pacific Islander (AAPI) focused subreddit. We welcome any folks from the Asian diaspora--not just American--as well as anyone who identifies with the label 'Asian,' regardless of immigration history. The goal is to offer a positive, affirming space to share experiences of being AAPI for anyone seeking this community. Memes, news, life advice, humor, and pop culture references are highly encouraged. I can refuse everything my mom gives me except for her medicinal soups. They taste really bad I mean they probably do have certain health benefits but I get into petty arguments because my mom keeps telling me to drink it when I've said no 10 times already and I tell her I'm busy. I literally avoid coming home before 8 pm which is when she goes to bed because my no's will land on deaf ears. It's weird to talk about this to some people. One person has asked me why does my family believe in pseudoscience after explaining some of the basics of Chinese medicine..
